attributes.action: Hold a referendum on the death penalty
attributes.background:
Hold a referendum on whether the death penalty should be introduced for child killers where there is unquestionable evidence.
They did it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Hold a referendum on restoring the Death Penalty for murder
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709623

Bring back the death penalty for homicide of a child
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/709710
